title: Ghostbusters
description: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

title: Amadeus
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: The Terminator
description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: Beverly Hills Cop
production_studio: Paramount Pictures, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

title: Gremlins
description: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

title: The Karate Kid
description: A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

title: This Is Spinal Tap
description: A mockumentary about a fictional British heavy metal band, Spinal Tap, on a disastrous American tour.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
production_studio: New Line Cinema, Media Home Entertainment
description: The monstrous spirit of a slain janitor seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

title: The Killing Fields
production_studio: Goldcrest Films International, International Film Investors
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

title: A Passage to India
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

title: Footloose
description: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

title: Sixteen Candles
description: A girl's 'sweet sixteen' birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

title: Splash
description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

title: Purple Rain
description: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

title: The Natural
description: An unknown middle-aged batter appears out of nowhere to take a losing 1930s baseball team to the top of the league.

title: Romancing the Stone
description: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
production_studio: The Ladd Company, Embassy International Pictures
description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he once again confronts the ghosts of his past.

title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

title: Dune
description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

title: Moscow on the Hudson
description: A Russian musician defects to the United States while on a trip to New York City and tries to build a new life for himself.

title: Stop Making Sense
description: A groundbreaking concert film that captures the Talking Heads at the height of their powers.

title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
description: Two cousins in New York's Little Italy get into trouble with the mob after they accidentally kill a police officer.

title: Broadway Danny Rose
description: A has-been talent agent gets a chance to make a comeback when he takes on a new client, a washed-up lounge singer.

title: Red Dawn
description: A group of high school students in a small Colorado town must defend their homes when the Soviet Union invades the United States.

title: The Last Starfighter
description: A video game expert is recruited by an alien defense force to fight in an interstellar war.

title: Revenge of the Nerds
description: At a big university, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

title: The Bounty
description: The story of the mutiny on the HMS Bounty, led by Fletcher Christian against the tyrannical Captain Bligh.

title: The NeverEnding Story
description: A boy who reads a magical book finds himself drawn into the story.

title: Repo Man
description: A young punk rocker is recruited by a car repossession agency and gets mixed up in a wild and wacky adventure.

title: Police Academy
description: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their shenanigans.

title: Children of the Corn
description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

title: Under the Volcano
description: The story of an alcoholic British consul in Mexico on the eve of World War II.

title: Paris, Texas
description: An amnesiac who has been missing for four years wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with his family.

title: Places in the Heart
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: In 1930s Texas, a widow with two children tries to save her family farm from foreclosure with the help of a blind man and a black drifter.

title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
description: A rock star/neurosurgeon/adventurer and his team of do-gooders must stop a group of interdimensional aliens from taking over the world.

title: A Soldier's Story
description: In 1944, a black Army captain is sent to a segregated Louisiana army base to investigate the murder of a black sergeant.

title: A Sunday in the Country
description: An aging artist in early 20th-century France spends a Sunday with his children and grandchildren.

title: Stranger Than Paradise
description: A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his Hungarian cousin comes to stay with him.

title: Irreconcilable Differences
description: A young girl sues her parents for divorce.

title: Micki + Maude
description: A man who is married to two women finds his life becoming increasingly complicated when both of them become pregnant.

title: Top Secret!

director.name: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

description: A rock and roll singer becomes involved in a resistance plot to rescue a scientist from an East German prison.

title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
description: Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway, only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

title: The Cotton Club
description: The story of the famous Harlem nightclub in the 1930s, as seen through the eyes of a white musician and a black dancer.

title: Starman
description: An alien takes the form of a young widow's dead husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government is in hot pursuit.

title: All of Me
description: A dying millionaire has her soul transferred into the body of a lawyer.

title: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
description: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery One.

title: Unfaithfully Yours
description: A successful composer suspects his wife of having an affair and plots to murder her.

title: The Bostonians
description: In 19th-century Boston, a feminist and a conservative lawyer vie for the affections of a beautiful young woman.

title: Blood Simple.
description: A Texas bar owner hires a private detective to kill his wife and her lover, but the plan goes horribly wrong.

title: A Private Function
description: In a small English town in 1947, a group of people conspire to raise a pig in secret to celebrate the wedding of Princess Elizabeth.
